price: 118. Lakisa bosôló kati kati na ngai na bango, mpe bikisa ngai na baye bazali elongo na ngai kati ya bandimi.
arabic: فَٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ فَتۡحٗا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-if'taḥ baynī wabaynahum fatḥan wanajjinī waman maʿiya mina al-mu'minīna
